TopicTitle: cant see text about stuff in space

Articles.Content: i'm pretty sure i've disabled something important.... when i try to "dock" (or in my case, go really, really fast toward something), i can't see the text saying the name, the distance, etc... any clue what i disabled? I though it was something i had to upgrade, but everything is fully upgraded.......
Go to settings and and see if vessel lables is enabled. If not, click the dot next to it and it Apply. Should work then.
Or the F4 key toggles the labels on and off and the F2 key toggles the UI overlay on and off.
